isis.stitle: 9 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON RT-8609 SERIES - INSTALL - SYNCHRONIZER AND RANGE CYLINDER ASSEMBLIES

step1.para: Place the shifting yoke on the yoke bar, long hub toward the front of the bar ( Figure 180). Align the slots in the yoke bar and install the two lockscrews. Secure with safety wire.

figure.caption: Figure 180. Place Shifting Yoke on Yoke Bar

step1.para: Place the yoke in the slot of the sliding clutch, threaded end of the piston bar toward the larger LO range synchronizer ( inset, Figure 181). Place the entire assembly into the auxiliary housing, engaging the splines of the sliding clutch with the output shaft and inserting the yoke bar through the cylinder bore.

figure.caption: Figure 181. Place Yoke in Slot of Sliding Clutch and Place Entire Assembly in Auxiliary Housing

step1.para: Install copper gasket on the threaded end of the yoke bar ( Figure 182).

figure.caption: Figure 182. Install Copper Gasket on Threaded End of Yoke Bar

step1.para: Install O-ring on the piston O.D. Apply a light coat of silicone lubricant to the O-ring ( Figure 183).

figure.caption: Figure 183. Install O-Ring on Piston O.D.

step1.para: Install the piston on the yoke bar and against the copper gasket, flat side of the piston out ( Figure 184).

figure.caption: Figure 184. Install Piston on Yoke Bar

step1.para: Install the lockwasher and nut on the yoke bar to secure the piston. Tighten to 60 to 70 ft-lbs. (81 to 95 N•m) ( Figure 185).

figure.caption: Figure 185. Install Lockwasher and Nut on Yoke Bar

step1.para: Install gasket ( inset) and cylinder cover with HI range port to the right. Tighten the four bolts to 35 to 45 ft-lbs. (47 to 61 N•m) ( Figure 186).

figure.caption: Figure 186. Install Gasket and Cylinder Cover
